post.body: ...maybe it's just my inebriated state, but that sounds like one HELL of an orgy I missed out on, w/my favorite bitches nonetheless.
Ohio's America's armpit, and Pennsylvania is the vein-bulging Spumco-styled thick neck. Lake Erie can be a shoulderpad.
Feel better, I hope your appendix survives & it's just a minor tummyproblem!~ Later I want to read the "Alternately Yours" paperplz.
suggesting to forego hearing godawful 8-bit versions of 'Eraser' & 'Hurt' is really misinterpreting a NINfan's unique masochism.
then again, such a financial senseless buttrape sounds just like classy old Jersey. (You + Me) + (a Zamboni + Napalm) / NJ = ...? :D
Existential thoughts keep overflowing in my mind... Anyone want some? 'Cuz rargh, makes it hard to zone out to Cartoon Network.
FESTIVE FAMILY TIMES a-hoy hoy! May the drunken doodles be saved and flow from this holiday anything like the booze has been..
In the end I wish to gurgle on a positive note how delicious consecutive feasts have been, but... I've revisited each twice. In the toilet.
Me? 'Gained a few sweaters, a pile of guiltangst/ decisionpressures, with finally a huge percentage lost of whatever I still 'owned'. Mm.
--or, in the best of cases, extremely thankful nonetheless we can appreciate what we still got when so much of us, uh, don't. Or soon won't.
The fancy pre-fabricated commercialized names for a season be damned, I'm sorry and lovin with y'all about wishing this week had been better
Had my first "Shawk-mas" with a Busaca, Wulf, Dragonwolf, Zinghedgie and of course mein Mouse last night~ Best holiday ever? Quite possibly.
Here's hoping David Duchovny learned better than Chris Carter & doesn't extend something awesome until it's a pile of shit, just for profit~
Finished season 2 of Californication. Very pleasantly surprised, but can NOT envision a season 3 in any form or fashion but demeaning.
... well, FUCK my father and his $500k salary and their insistence I live on foodstamps and that we kids stop bothering them so much. Rock.
I *still* don't have the tech personally, but one day I WILL finish the storyboards... *drooltwitch* WHAT I AM NOT OBSESSED STOP JUDGING ME.
At least Reznor's making the fans prove yes, they DO have HD technology to make good Ghosts-fan vids, we are all just procrastinating fucks.
--Hory shit I wish I could be at the ninorgy that'll happen tonight in Victoria BC (http://tinyurl.com/5w2j5o) But, I always wanna be in BC.
So I'm in love with Alessandro Cortini. It took so long, but his music emo'd deep into my bones. BlindOldFreak.com & Modwheelmood.com <3
...I say such a statement from the bottom of my newly-initiated however temporary Eastern Pennsylvanian heart.
